meanings.sent1: She is redoing her homework to correct the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: I am redoing my room to make it look nicer.
meanings.sent3: He kept redoing the puzzle until he finally solved it.
meanings.sent4: The artist is redoing the painting to capture the right mood.
meanings.sent5: By redoing the experiment, she discovered the error in her calculations.

meanings.definition: The act of doing something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The redoing of the project took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: Her redoing of the recipe resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The redoing of the play made the audience laugh at the mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: The redoing of the garden transformed it into a beautiful space.
meanings.sent5: Through the redoing of the presentation, he found a more engaging way to present the information.
